Articles.Content:
Way back in 0.23, I started to discover KSP. Now the main game time is KSP. So realizing that KSP has totally removed my inclination to play Mount & Blade, I strolled over to TaleWorlds site and watched their video.

The work this team accomplshed back in 2008 was very decent. This latest work they have developed seems impressive, but, I really have little experiance with game engines, world textures and models.

They have created an in-house game engine and state the editor is professional and easy to use and will be available to modders. The mountain area mentioned covered 225 km2, that seems large. They indicate how their game engine would improve graphics and animations without scaraficing preformance or gameplay. Just would like to tap into this communities knowledge for a review of their latest work.

Who ever is responsible for this please identify. So I can give you some rep. This picture just cracked me up. It doesnt look like it is from M&B. Where is it from?
I believe it's just a kerbal head photoshopped onto some Warhammer 40,000 (fan?)art.
